| HistoryText             = The '''Squirrel Scouts''' are the loyal allies of [[Doreen Green (Earth-616)|Squirrel Girl]].<!-- {{r|Unbeatable Squirrel Girl Vol 2 20}} -->

When being threatened by attack from [[Melissa Morbeck (Earth-616)|Melissa Morbeck]]'s mosquito army, [[Tippy-Toe (Earth-616)|Tippy-Toe]] recruited several other squirrels to sit on the shoulders of Squirrel Girl and her friends to protect them.{{r|Unbeatable Squirrel Girl Vol 2 20}}

[[File:Doreen Green (Earth-616) and Squirrel Scouts (Earth-616) from Unbeatable Squirrel Girl Vol 2 27 001.jpg|thumb|left|[[Doreen Green (Earth-616)|Squirrel Girl]] meeting with the Squirrel Scouts.]]
When [[Nancy Whitehead (Earth-616)|Nancy Whitehead]] and Tippy-Toe mysteriously disappeared, Squirrel Girl deployed the Squirrel Scouts to search for them. Unfortunately, after six hours of searching the only thing they accomplished was the new headline ''"NY State squirrels slightly nosier than usual."''{{r|Unbeatable Squirrel Girl Vol 2 27}}
